title: Franco-Swiss Airport Evacuated For "Security Reasons" ahead of Olympics
content: A Franco-Swiss airport was evacuated for security reasons on Friday, hours after arson attacks disrupted the French rail network ahead of the Olympics opening ceremony.
summary: A Franco-Swiss airport was evacuated for security reasons on Friday, hours after arson attacks disrupted the French rail network ahead of the Olympics opening ceremony.

title: Barack Obama, Wife Michelle Endorse Kamala Harris' Bid For US Presidency
content: Former President Barack Obama and his wife Michelle endorsed Kamala Harris' bid for president on Friday in a roughly one-minute long video that captured a private phone call between the couple and the current vice president.
summary: Former President Barack Obama and his wife Michelle endorsed Kamala Harris' bid for president on Friday in a roughly one-minute long video that captured a private phone call between the couple and the current vice president.

title: Sabotage, Fires Across France Rail Network Ahead Of Olympics: 10 Facts
content: Paris is decked up to host a grand opening ceremony later today for the 2024 Olympics, but went into a tizzy after the rail network was crippled by "malicious acts".
summary: Paris is decked up to host a grand opening ceremony later today for the 2024 Olympics, but went into a tizzy after the rail network was crippled by "malicious acts".

title: Rockets Fired At Bases Hosting US Troops In Iraq, Syria
content: Four rockets fell in the vicinity" of Ain al-Assad base in Anbar province, an Iraqi security source said. Another security official said an attack occurred with "a drone and three rockets" that fell close to the base perimeter.
summary: Four rockets fell in the vicinity" of Ain al-Assad base in Anbar province, an Iraqi security source said. Another security official said an attack occurred with "a drone and three rockets" that fell close to the base perimeter.

title: Elon Musk Disowned By Transgender Daughter: "He's Desperate For Attention"
content: Elon Musk's estranged transgender daughter, who he had alleged was "killed" by "woke mind virus", has "disowned" him.

title: Greece's "Instagram Island" Santorini Worried About "Overtourism"
content: There are people spending a lot of money to be on Santorini and they don't want the island to be swamped. Instagram has defined the way people choose the places to visit

title: Taiwan Olympic Legend Finds Her Life Story In Aamir Khan's 'Dangal'
content: "When I watched Dangal with Chinese subtitles a few years ago, I noticed an uncanny resemblance between the wrestlers' father and my own," says Chen Shih-hsin, Taiwan's first-ever Olympic gold medallist.
summary: "When I watched Dangal with Chinese subtitles a few years ago, I noticed an uncanny resemblance between the wrestlers' father and my own," says Chen Shih-hsin, Taiwan's first-ever Olympic gold medallist.

title: French Rail Network "Sabotaged" Ahead Of Olympics, 8 Lakh People Affected
content: "This is a massive attack on a large scale to paralyse the TGV network," SNCF told AFP, adding that many routes will have to be cancelled and the situation would last "at least all weekend while repairs are conducted".
summary: "This is a massive attack on a large scale to paralyse the TGV network," SNCF told AFP, adding that many routes will have to be cancelled and the situation would last "at least all weekend while repairs are conducted".

title: Hamas Leader Dies In Israeli Custody In West Bank

title: "I Pray Your Daughter Is...": Jennifer Aniston Slams Trump's Running Mate

title: After 55 Years, One Of Australia's Biggest Maritime Mysteries Solved
content: 55 years after it sank, killing 21 men, Australian scientists have finally located the shipwreck of the MV Noongah.

title: JD Vance's "Childless Cat Ladies" Jab At Kamala Harris Sparks Uproar

title: Sri Lanka's First Presidential Vote Since Unrest To Be Held On September 21

title: Does Joe Biden Have Parkinson's Disease? What His Personal Doctor Says

title: US Senator Introduces Bill That Proposes To Treat India Like Its Top Allies

title: Mexican Drug Lord 'El Mayo' And El Chapo's Son Arrested In US
content: Mexican drug lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada and the son of his former partner, Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman, were arrested in Texas, U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland said in a statement on Thursday.
summary: Mexican drug lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada and the son of his former partner, Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman, were arrested in Texas, U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland said in a statement on Thursday.
